import React, { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import '../Css/ProductScreen.css' import ReactImageMagnify from 'react-image-magnify' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const num = useParams() const fetchProduct = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`//${num.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() //const product = products.find((p) => p._id === num.id) return( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Price: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Not in stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
